lead_paragraph: SINENBERG--Jean R.,passed peacefully in her sleep at her daughters home in Bridgehampton. Jean was an icon in the antique business in the Hamptons with her shop Georgica Creek Antiques. She was well known for her annual summer antique events in Bridgehampton and East Hampton. She leaves behind her son Clifford and his wife Barbara (Eichenberger) and her granddaughters Lindsay and Rachel along with her business partner and daughter, Suzanne Sinenberg. Burial took place February 19, at Edgewood Cemetery in Bridgehampton. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SINENBERG, JEAN R.
